name: A tale from below
description:
Hello everyone !!! This is "A tale from below" , the story of a gamer in hell . Although he's still alive he doesn't remember anything and the reason why he ended up in hell remains unclear . The journey of our gamer through hell begins ... find powerful weapons , kill hordes of demons , slay mighty beasts and explore the 7 rings of hell in order to discover the truth behind the mystery....

To get updatet on the progress of this project follow us on instagram at tappy_games : https://www.instagram.com/tappy_games/?hl=en

and if you want me to  I may start a devlog on my Youtube channel
